dmca.title: [ABUSE] GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 16, 2005 12:44 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: "Dana Hanson, Learning Strategies"  
> <DanaH@LearningStrategies.com>
> Date: December 15, 2005 3:51:36 PM CST
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
> Subject: [ABUSE] GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM
> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
>
> To whom may concern:
>
> You are currently hosting GOAL-SETTING-GUIDE.COM (67.18.86.95), 
> registered to Karina Kronkalne.  On this site are the following three 
> pages:
>
> (http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/achievement.html)
>
> (http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/mindset.html)
>
> (http://www.goal-setting-guide.com/go/genius.html)
>
> These mimic our legitimate web pages at http:// 
> www.learningstrategies.com .
>
> Ms. Kronkalne is not an affiliate of ours and and has repeatedly 
> ignored our request to cease and desist.  The email address listed on 
> her site is not valid and the address listed in whois is also not 
> valid.
>
> I request that you investigate this site and pull it down if 
> necessary.
>
> Contact me with any questions. 952-767-9838 or 
> DanaH@LearningStrategies.com
>
> Sincerely,
>
> Dana Hanson
> Customer Service and Success Coaching
>
> Learning Strategies Corporation -
> 2000 Plymouth Road - Minnetonka, Minnesota  55305-2335 USA 
> 952-476-9200 - 800-735-8273 - Fax 952-475-2373 - 
> http://www.LearningStrategies.com
>
>
>
>
